item.title: Day 0
item.description: A hello world. We have been meaning to archive our internal reading club discussions. This is a pilot day for that. Since this our firstâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
A hello world.

We have been meaning to archive our internal reading club discussions. This is a pilot day for that.

Since this our first time with recordings, you might find awkward silences and transitions and general lack of audio and projection quality.
